actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to the Redwood National Park in the State of California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the addition of various lands to the Redwood National Park in the State of California for the purpose of preserving additional stands of redwood trees in areas adjacent to the park.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the addition of certain lands to the Redwood National Park in the State of California, and for other purposes.
